newsitem.title: UK: UK unit trust body welcomes DMG trust guarantee.
newsitem.headline: UK unit trust body welcomes DMG trust guarantee.

text.p: The Association of Unit Trusts and Investment Funds has welcomed Deutsche Bank AG's guarantee to cover liabilities of three unit trusts which were suspended from dealing on Monday.
"Investors in funds should be reassured by Morgan Grenfell's very positive moved to protect investors' holdings," said Philip Warland, who is director general of AUTIF, which represents the industry.
Late on Tuesday Deutsche stepped in with 150-200 million stg to buy problem securities out of three of Morgan Grenfell Asset Management's unit trusts.
The action to compensate shareholders in the MG European Growth Trust, the MG European Capital Growth Fund and MG Europa would maintain the indsustry's reputation, Warland said.
